DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the effect of exercise training in the autonomic nervous system activity in breast cancer patients, who underwent doxorubicin medication.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Exercise Training in Autonomic Modulation in Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer patients at stages 1, 2 and 3; Sedentary; Currently at treatment; 46 months after surgery Musculoskeletal injuries or disorders; Mental illnesses Stage 4 (Metastasis) Enrolled in other exercise program
